ch.aplu.util

Class StringEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.util.EntryItem
      • ch.aplu.util.TextEntry
        • ch.aplu.util.StringEntry

  • public class StringEntry
extends TextEntry
    Class derived from EntryItem to create an input text field in a EntryDialog. IntEntry, LongEntry, DoubleEntry and StringEntry can be mixed up in the same EntryPane.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringEntry(java.lang.String prompt)
      Creates a text field with given prompt text.
      StringEntry(java.lang.String prompt, java.lang.String init)
      Creates a text field with given prompt text and given initializing value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the current value in the text field.

      Selects if the text field is editable.
      void setValue(java.lang.String value)
      Enters a integer number into the text field programmatically.
